# Section 2

## dplyr pipe

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
data2 <- data %>% 
    filter(column1 == "A") %>%
    group_by(column2) %>%
    summarize(column3 = sum(column3))
```

## dplyr sql

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
query <- . %>%
    filter(column1 == "A") %>%
    group_by(column2) %>%
    summarize(column3 = sum(column3))

con <- src_postgres("db_name", "host_name", 1234, "user_name")
con %>% tbl("table_name") %>% query %>% explain
con %>% tbl("table_name") %>% query %>% collect
```
